name: CDRC Data Catalogue
description: The Consumer Data Research Centre is the UK's leading source of consumer data, a Phase 1 ESRC Smart Data Research UK (SDRUK) data service. Offers data under three tiers: Open, Safeguarded and Secure. Access to Safeguarded/Secure data is through a reviewed application process. Secure data is accessed through our labs at UCL's central London campus, or remotely through UCL's Data Safe Haven.
